title: Mr. Belani receives the Ambassador of Georgia
text: The Secretary General of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the National Community abroad, Mr. Amar Belani received, Sunday, the Ambassador of Georgia, George Jangava who handed him copies of his credentials accrediting him as a new non-resident Ambassador in Algeria.
Mr. Belani wished the new Ambassador success in the accomplishment of his mission.Â
The meeting allowed both parties to discuss bilateral relations and ways and means to develop them in various areas, and to exchange views on regional and international issues of common interest.
